/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades adorned with various signs and advertisements, hinting at the bustling commercial activity in the area. Cars and pedestrians add life to the scene, going about their daily routines. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, providing a beautiful backdrop to the urban landscape.
